tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******** ****** ** * **** **** ****** * *** **** ****. My wife is her patient. Doctor–patient relationship (DPR) is considered to be the core element in the ethical principles of medicine.
I observed Dr. Vaishali listen to the patient very carefully and give them a good treatment along with her good conversation which gives positive vibes to the patient which helps them to get cure soon.
I shall definitely recommend others and my friends to consult Dr. Vaishali for their health issues.
I wish Dr. Vaishali Shedge all the very best for her future journey.

Padmanabh Rajwade

tags: None
review:
Very kind and a humble person
 I have been very fortunate to get the best treatment under Dr. Vaishali Shedge the whole pregnancy had a few complications as my amniotic fluid levels were relatively less throughout my pregnancy but Dr. Shedge's treatment and assisstance i was blessed with a healthy and lovely baby boy
All thanks to her that kept me motivated and confident and not lose hope
I will strongly recommend Dr. Vaishali Shedge
***** *** ** **** * **** ****** **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
1. Dr. Vaishali was almost 5 hours late for the appointment. I tried to cancel but nobody responded
2. When I spoke with Dr. Vaishali, she was in a hurry and asked me 2-3 questions (not in depth) and started talking about medication, costs etc 
3. I tried to talk about my lifestyle but at that time she began to hurry up further. I tried to ask about the medication and she told me “do you want me to tell you or not” 
4. I explained my pains again, told Dr. Vaishali that her attitude made me uncomfortable and she continued to gaslight me. 
5. Overall I felt disrespected and somewhat hurt with the way she spoke with me. Her tone was arrogant and rude. 
5. I was charged in full, even though i did not even have a consultation.

Over all very good and healthy experience.

Actually I have visit her for 1st time, But the way she diagnosed and explain me about the do and don't for the treatment. It was just the first attempt Me and my Husband decided to go with her. And now I have been operated sucessfully and the result is I am healthy and happy now.

tags: None
review: I went to her for my infertility treatment,there was some problems with both of us,she explained everything wonderfully and sympathetically ,then solved one by one,mean while always kept us motivated throughout the period,we got conceived and now taking treatment under her for my pregnancy,I will surely recommend her**** **** **** ****** but a very nice human being also

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Vaishali is very down to earth person very friendly she made me understand the treatment in a easy way also though i was stuck up in traffic she waited for me which nowadays drs dont do.So i am very thankful to her for that also my aunt underwent surgery done by mam and she too recovered well she also has given lot of blessings to her.I am very happy that i have a dr like vaishali mam thanks mam keep up the good work god bless u.
